title: When is the Carath\'eodory metric a K\"ahler metric?
authors: Robert Xin Dong, Ruoyi Wang, Bun Wong
abstract:
We prove that if the Carath\'eodory metric on a strictly pseudoconvex domain
with a smooth boundary is a K\"{a}hler metric, then the domain is biholomorphic
to a ball. Additionally, we highlight the relationships between the Lu constant
and the holomorphic Bergman curvature.
